document_data.name: Reesa
document_data.History: Reesa was a merchant and Hagen's daughter. Reesa would greet the [[Kalach-Cha]] if the Kalach-Cha sided with the Watch. Like her father, she thought the Watch was ineffective, but would gain a better impression of them. Before thieves came, Hagen dismissed her, as she could have been captured.
